meanings.definition: A type of bacteria that is beneficial to the digestive system.
meanings.sent1: Adding acidophilus to your diet can improve your digestion.
meanings.sent2: Many people take acidophilus supplements for a healthy gut.
meanings.sent3: The acidophilus in your yogurt is like a superhero for your stomach!
meanings.sent4: In the world of bacteria, acidophilus is the friendly neighbor that helps out.
meanings.sent5: Imagine acidophilus as a tiny army fighting for your digestive health.

meanings.definition: A probiotic organism that helps maintain a healthy balance of bacteria in the gut.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended acidophilus to restore the balance in my gut flora.
meanings.sent2: Probiotic foods like yogurt contain acidophilus to support gut health.
meanings.sent3: I like to think of acidophilus as the peacekeeper in my stomach's ecosystem.
meanings.sent4: In the battle of good and bad bacteria, acidophilus is the hero that saves the day.
meanings.sent5: Visualize acidophilus as a guardian angel watching over your gut microbiome.
